JojaGreen.Description: Change anything Joja-related to the green of the exterior from Seaside Valley

BathhouseMapFix.Description: Tiny map edit that fixes the missing stool top in the women's locker room

MovieTheater.Description: Changes to both versions of the movie theater & the screening room

Submarine.Description: Interior of the submarine at the Night Market

TownFramingColor.AllowValues: BlackCool, BlackWarm, Blue, Chestnut, Chocolate, Coffee, Cowboy, Earth, Green, Grey, GreyLight, Husk, Pale, Raisin, Red, Tobacco, Tudor, Walnut, WhiteCool, WhiteWarm
TownFramingColor.Description: Choose a framing/molding/window color for the town interiors

TownDoorColor.AllowValues: BlackCool, BlackWarm, Blue, Chestnut, Chocolate, Coffee, Cowboy, Earth, Green, Grey, GreyLight, Husk, Pale, Raisin, Red, Tobacco, Tudor, Walnut, WhiteCool, WhiteWarm
TownDoorColor.Description: Color for doors in town interiors

FurnitureStyle.Description: Global furniture style -  Single is all a unified color, multi has light, med and dark shades of the same color, and Original has the 3 different colors shown in the original previews (Original does not use the color options below, it is what it is)

TownFurnitureColor.AllowValues: BlackCool, BlackWarm, Blue, Chestnut, Chocolate, Coffee, Cowboy, Earth, Green, Grey, GreyLight, Husk, Pale, Raisin, Red, Tobacco, Tudor, Walnut, WhiteCool, WhiteWarm
TownFurnitureColor.Description: The color that will be either single or multi-toned. If you chose Original style, this choice affects nothing.

AdventureGuildInterior.Description: Sets the framing, furniture and door color in the adventure guild to darker wood tones (Raisin for framing, Chestnut for furniture & door)

BlacksmithInterior.Description: Framing, window and door made warm black; also makes bedspread blue, bedroom wall white plaster, and better color matches parts of the forge

CarpenterInterior.Description: Changes counters & shelf in lab room area of the carpenter shop

CarpenterMapFix.Description: 2 small map edits to the carpenter shop - Fixes the double bed in Robin's room and the paneling by the lab room. (Not compatible with SVE or Less Ugly Interiors - disabled automatically if you have either mod)

CarpenterFraming.AllowValues: DEFAULT, BlackCool, BlackWarm, Blue, Chestnut, Chocolate, Coffee, Cowboy, Earth, Green, Grey, GreyLight, Husk, Pale, Raisin, Red, Tobacco, Tudor, Walnut, WhiteCool, WhiteWarm
CarpenterFraming.Description: Set the color of the framing and windows in the carpenter shop. DEFAULT will use whatever you chose for the rest of the town.

CarpenterFurn.AllowValues: DEFAULT, BlackCool, BlackWarm, Blue, Chestnut, Chocolate, Coffee, Cowboy, Earth, Green, Grey, GreyLight, Husk, Pale, Raisin, Red, Tobacco, Tudor, Walnut, WhiteCool, WhiteWarm
CarpenterFurn.Description: Set the color of the furniture in the carpenter shop. DEFAULT will use whatever you chose for the rest of the town.

CommCtrInterior.Description: Corrects a few issues in the refurbished Community Center - sink in kitchen, makes black couch into blue in reading corner, and fixes the shadow under pantry shelf

CommCtrFraming.AllowValues: DEFAULT, BlackCool, BlackWarm, Blue, Chestnut, Chocolate, Coffee, Cowboy, Earth, Green, Grey, GreyLight, Husk, Pale, Raisin, Red, Tobacco, Tudor, Walnut, WhiteCool, WhiteWarm
CommCtrFraming.Description: Set the color of the framing and windows in the refurbished Community Center. DEFAULT will use whatever you chose for the rest of the town.

CommCtrFurn.AllowValues: DEFAULT, BlackCool, BlackWarm, Blue, Chestnut, Chocolate, Coffee, Cowboy, Earth, Green, Grey, GreyLight, Husk, Pale, Raisin, Red, Tobacco, Tudor, Walnut, WhiteCool, WhiteWarm
CommCtrFurn.Description: Set the color of the furniture in the refurbished Community Center. DEFAULT will use whatever you chose for the rest of the town.

HaleyInterior.Description: Gives Haley a striped pink bedspead and Emily a rainbow one

HarveyInterior.Description: Replaces the plaid wallpapers and countertop in Harvey's apartment

LeahInterior.Description: Gives Leah's house green framing, stone floors instead of brick & hay, and a plaid bedspead

MarnieInterior.Description: Changes Jas's bedspread and stool cushion to pink, and makes the kitchen a custom white wood with a stove

MarnieMapEdit.Description: Small map edit to Marnie's house to fix Jas's bed (Not compatible with SVE or Less Ugly Interiors and will not apply if you have either mod)

MarnieFraming.AllowValues: DEFAULT, BlackCool, BlackWarm, Blue, Chestnut, Chocolate, Coffee, Cowboy, Earth, Green, Grey, GreyLight, Husk, Pale, Raisin, Red, Tobacco, Tudor, Walnut, WhiteCool, WhiteWarm
MarnieFraming.Description: Set the color of the framing and windows in Marnie's house. DEFAULT will use whatever colors you chose for the rest of the town.

MuseumInterior.Description: Slight edit to stool and step-stool to better match colors

MuseumFraming.AllowValues: DEFAULT, BlackCool, BlackWarm, Blue, Chestnut, Chocolate, Coffee, Cowboy, Earth, Green, Grey, GreyLight, Husk, Pale, Raisin, Red, Tobacco, Tudor, Walnut, WhiteCool, WhiteWarm
MuseumFraming.Description: Set the color of the framing and windows in the museum. DEFAULT will use whatever colors you chose for the rest of the town.

MuseumFurn.AllowValues: DEFAULT, BlackCool, BlackWarm, Blue, Chestnut, Chocolate, Coffee, Cowboy, Earth, Green, Grey, GreyLight, Husk, Pale, Raisin, Red, Tobacco, Tudor, Walnut, WhiteCool, WhiteWarm
MuseumFurn.Description: Set the color of the furniture in the museum. DEFAULT will use whatever color you chose for the rest of the town.

PierreMapEdit.Description: Fixes the double bed in Pierre & Caroline's roomn (Compatible with both SVE and Less Ugly Interiors)

PierreInterior.Description: Gives Pierre & Caroline a custom bedspread and fixes the corkboard texture (note: bedspread will not look right without the map fix enabled)

PierreFraming.AllowValues: DEFAULT, BlackCool, BlackWarm, Blue, Chestnut, Chocolate, Coffee, Cowboy, Earth, Green, Grey, GreyLight, Husk, Pale, Raisin, Red, Tobacco, Tudor, Walnut, WhiteCool, WhiteWarm
PierreFraming.Description: Set the color of the framing and windows in Pierre's shop. DEFAULT will use whatever colors you chose for the rest of the town.

PierreFurn.AllowValues: DEFAULT, BlackCool, BlackWarm, Blue, Chestnut, Chocolate, Coffee, Cowboy, Earth, Green, Grey, GreyLight, Husk, Pale, Raisin, Red, Tobacco, Tudor, Walnut, WhiteCool, WhiteWarm
PierreFurn.Description: Set the color of the furniture in Pierre's shop. DEFAULT will use whatever color you chose for the rest of the town.

SaloonInterior.Description: Changes the wall in Gus's bedroom to plaster, gives him a plaid bedspread, fixes some shadows around the bar shelf corners, and removes the unnecessary cord hanging off the TV in Alex's special room

SaloonFraming.AllowValues: DEFAULT, BlackCool, BlackWarm, Blue, Chestnut, Chocolate, Coffee, Cowboy, Earth, Green, Grey, GreyLight, Husk, Pale, Raisin, Red, Tobacco, Tudor, Walnut, WhiteCool, WhiteWarm
SaloonFraming.Description: Set the color of the framing and windows in the saloon. DEFAULT will use whatever colors you chose for the rest of the town.

SaloonFurn.AllowValues: DEFAULT, BlackCool, BlackWarm, Blue, Chestnut, Chocolate, Coffee, Cowboy, Earth, Green, Grey, GreyLight, Husk, Pale, Raisin, Red, Tobacco, Tudor, Walnut, WhiteCool, WhiteWarm
SaloonFurn.Description: Set the color of the furniture in the saloon. DEFAULT will use whatever color you chose for the rest of the town.

SaloonBarFraming.Description: If enabled, the bar shelves and counter in the saloon will match the framing color (instead of the furniture color)

SamInterior.Description: Makes both couches blue in Sam's house

SamMapFix.Description: Tiny map edit to fix the footboard of Vincent's bed (Compatible with SVE and Less Ugly Interiors)

SebastianInterior.Description: Gives Sebastian an appropriately dark wood basement - framing, door (both Warm Black) and furniture (Coffee)

TrailerInterior.Description: Interior edits for Pam & Penny's trailer - changes the stove into another counter with a built in mini fridge and hot plate burner, makes all the wall lights the same (no lantern type), and uses a custom framing/wall color

TrailerUpdatedInterior.Description: Interior edits for Pam & Penny's updated trailer - Gives each of their beds a custom bedspread color (Pam = purple, Penny = pink), changes the plank wall to beige plaster, and the greenhouse glass wall to blue plaster

WillyInterior.Description: Light Grey framing color and more rustic shop counters for Willy's shop

WizardInterior.Description: Sets framing color for Wizard interior (Tobacco). Also better matches the stone wall to the fireplace, fixes the books on the floor (no spare pixels), and replaces the rugs with fancier antique ones

FHCrib.Description: Replace the crib in the farmhouse

CribColor.AllowValues: BlackCool, BlackWarm, Blue, Chestnut, Chocolate, Coffee, Cowboy, Earth, Green, Grey, GreyLight, Husk, Pale, Raisin, Red, Tobacco, Tudor, Walnut, WhiteCool, WhiteWarm

CribSheets.AllowValues: Green, Blue, Pink, Purple, Taupe, Yellow, Rainbow

FHKitchen.Description: Replace the kitchen in the farmhouse with the selected option

FHFramingColor.AllowValues: BlackCool, BlackWarm, Blue, Chestnut, Chocolate, Coffee, Cowboy, Earth, Green, Grey, GreyLight, Husk, Pale, Raisin, Red, Tobacco, Tudor, Walnut, WhiteCool, WhiteWarm
FHFramingColor.Description: Select the color of the molding/framing/trim in the farmhouse (includes the island farmhouse)

WallsFloors.Description: Makes the farmhouse flooring and wooden trim on wallpaper match the selected framing color and town flooring. Slight edits to the non-wood parts to better match general aesthetic. Only affects the 8 walls & floors from each farm map (+ the kids room dinos) - not all of them

GreenhouseFramingColor.AllowValues: BlackCool, BlackWarm, Blue, Chestnut, Chocolate, Coffee, Cowboy, Earth, Green, Grey, GreyLight, Husk, Pale, Raisin, Red, Tobacco, Tudor, Walnut, WhiteCool, WhiteWarm
GreenhouseFramingColor.Description: Select the color of the molding/framing/trim in the greenhouse

CoopInterior.Description: Changes Coop & Barn interior tiles - Marnie = only affects Marnie's barn, All = Also changes the coops and barns on your farm.

HeartEvents.Description: Edits textures related to villager heart and special events, such as Harvey's balloon ride, Sebastian's frog rescue, Gus's giant omelet, etc. Anything completely necessary (like bits of flooring or furniture) will be applied regardless of whether this is enabled or not

JojaFurniture.Description: Edit the joja_Furniture tilesheet - will be blue or green automatically

Craftables.Description: Edit some of the Craftables tilesheet
